pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Friday, December 3, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a virtual question and answer session with health advocate and co-founder of the Vohra-Miller Foundation Sabina Vohra-Miller, where he will respond to questions from parents and children about vaccines.

The session will be streamed live on Twitter via the following link: https://twitter.com/SabiVM
